div.ab: Verses by Valadata Daughter of Mohamad Almostakfi Billah of Cordova to her lover AbansiCasiri has 'Abdusius' – a noble Moor.

lg.l: “My presence wounds your heart, yet not less true
“My cheeks in blushes speak my love for you
“Yet mutual wounds not equal shame impart
“By all my cheek is seen but not your heart.
lg.note: WG's translation is quite far from the Latin given by Casiri (vol. 1, p. 106), so is indeed likely based on the Arabic original in Casiri's footnote b.

div.ab: King Don Hernando took Ronda in 485 هجريHijri, the Islamic calendarThough Gell has (by missing a letter) actually written the verb:هجر flee before 1486.

In Marmol – prophecy in inquisition of Granada .p182. that Turks will take Rome with armies & the Moors will take the Isla de España, y Malaga se tornara a labrar y edificarthe Moors will take the Island of Spain, and Málaga will return to working and building. At Velez & Almuñecar will be quell’d the pride of the heresy of Cordova which keeps it in its vices & sins. A Comet the sign of this.

Recibo de ti mi dios lo que me has ordenadoMármol has ‘Recibo de tí, mi Dios, lo que me has ordenado’: I receive from you, my God, what you have ordered for me.. Çidi el Guerguali a MorabiteMármol has 'Cidi' (no cedilla). A marabout, a Muslim holy man or hermit..

Prophecy of Tauca alMármol has 'el' Hamema or Doves breast. Succour to Islam when year begins with Saturday & a cloud of birds come among which 2 are Gabriel & MiguelThe archangels Gabriel and Michael – then all world moslemMármol has 'volverá todo el mundo á la ley de los Moros': all the world will come under the law of the Moors. –

In inquisition of Granada & in cave of Castares in Alpuxárra. Translated by Alonzo del Castillo Interpreter of Office. but he says the Arabic is so equivocal that a long or short vowell makes all the difference. “The generation of those who adore one only God shall possess Gibraltar for it was their origin & entry & to them shall return in 10th succession. y que dios revelo no falto ni faltarà.Mármol has 'Y lo que Dios reveló, no faltó, ni faltará': And what God revealed was not lacking, nor will it be lacking.

Convertios a dios y no os durmais que amanecerais sepultados entre las peñas.Mármol has 'convertios á Dios, y no os durmais, que amanecereis sepultados entre las penas': turn to God, and do not sleep, lest you wake buried among miseries.

The [drawing: crescent moon] shall descend into the garden of Tuhema after the [drawing: full moon] shall have risen split & prophets shall appear. Then shall a King son of a faultless King with Troops take Alhambra & thence many provinces & climes. Then shall be glory to the Moors. He takes Seville & at the first sally Antequera climbing its walls & by force of arms rompiendolosbreaking them. 7 years this victory endures & riches taken from Heretics. Dolarfe King of the Xtians Christians . A Brutal old Antichrist will sow at midday & reap at vespers
He Plants trees with right & plucks fruits with left hand – Sins were before as heavy as mountains.
div.note: From Luis del Mármol Carvajal, Historia del rebelion y castigo de los moriscos del reyno de Granada, 2 vols (Madrid, 1797), vol. 1, pp. 178, 181-4, 190-5. WG's page reference is to the 1797 second edition, rather than to Mármol's original work of 1600.
